attributes.action: Introduce Saliva tests for fully vaccinated people to go abroad and come back
attributes.additional_details: Introducing saliva tests would bring the travel industry back to pre Covid and will make more people go abroad, even for a higher price these should be brought into use, swab tests put people off from going abroad, their time consuming and extremely uncomfortable.
attributes.background: People are getting fed up of having to have a swab Covid test to go abroad and come back, their unpleasant and uncomfortable, that's why the saliva tests should be introduced as a alternative to swab tests for traveling.

rejection.details:
At least one provider of Covid-19 tests required by the UK Government for international offers saliva testing. It is up to individual test providers what tests to offer.

Decisions about what tests to require incoming travellers to take before arrival are a matter for the countries travellers are going to, not the Government or House of Commons.
